model.query: SELECT mean("available") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT count("available") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("used") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("total") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("available_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load15") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

model.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 10s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 10s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT last(bytes_recv) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT last(bytes_sent) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)

model.query: SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT count("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT count("inodes_free") FROM "disk" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

model.query: select mean("used") from disk where $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/  and path =  '$path' group by time($interval) fill(null)

targets.query: select count("free") from disk where $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/  and path =  '$path' group by time($interval) fill(null)
select count("used") from disk where $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/  and path =  '$path' group by time($interval) fill(null)
select count("total") from disk where $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/  and path =  '$path' group by time($interval) fill(null)

model.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 10s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 1s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 1s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

model.query: SELECT mean(tcp_established)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT count(err_in)   FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT count(err_out)   FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT count(context_switches)   FROM "kernel" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT count(interrupts)   FROM "kernel" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select blocked,running,sleeping,total,total_threads,zombies from processes where  host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT count(running)   FROM "processes" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT count(paging)   FROM "processes" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT count(total)   FROM "processes" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
